# Meridian campaign order of battle: Confederate

The following Confederate States Army units and commanders fought in the Meridian campaign (3 February â€“ 6 March 1864) during the American Civil War. Order of battle was compiled from the army organization during the campaign. The strength numbers listed in the tables are "present for duty".
Abbreviations used
Military rank
* LTG = Lieutenant General
* MG = Major General
* BG = Brigadier General
* Col = Colonel
* Ltc = Lieutenant Colonel
* Maj = Major
* Cpt = Captain
* Lt  = Lieutenant
Other
* w = wounded
* mw = mortally wounded
* k = killed
